Wow the last time I was on here was near x-mas. lol. That was forever and a day ago. Do not have to read. I just do this for myself so I have some memories some where. lol

So much has happened since then. Let's start from recently.

Band Banquet was pretty cool. The seniors got awesome gifts. I'm so happy I got an old marching hat. :D I always wanted one!!! Now I wish I could get the rest of my uniform. 

Spectrum concert was pretty cool. We got to play Pirates of the Carribean. I was happy. :) I think the best song though was The Great Locamotive Chase. If only the audience didn't mess it up at the end for both nights. lol

Last day of school came and went. :( One good thing about it is that I don't have to see the evil demon woman. SWEET!! I will be going to school sometime next week before graduation to help out Mr. Clem.

Grad Nite was freakin sweet. I wish I could go back though. I'm still pissed that Space Mountain kept shutting down and I never got to ride it that night!! :( I'm a sad panda. I kinda got sick after Stich's Encounter though. Bleh. Other than that I had fun. I wanna post some pic's soon. Hopefully when I get them developed that won't come out shitty like they did with my prom pic's.

Prom was fun. Just wish they would have played more than 4 non rap songs.:p I had calamarai for the first time. It was pretty cool.

OMG, State Band Festival. Band was freakin awsome!!!!! Straight  Superiors!!!!So proud of you guys!!!!
Superplay was fun. Bowling lanes suck though. They kept stopping our game. Laser tag was....different lol. Bastered's kept cheating though. Wanted to punch them.

April 9th was a horse show that I was going to show in. That didn't happen. :( I got to take my friend though which was cool. I'm glad that she at least got to show. I'm pissed off at the fact that the judge didn't even look at her and kept picking the same 6 people to place in the classes. Duchbag!!!! (don't care if I didn't spell it right, you know what it's supposed to be). Hopefully now though they will bring back open mini classes so she can show again.

Jag Jeopardy....2 words....Time Warp. I didn't know, or forgot, that it was going to be broadcasted threwout the school. lol. If I was on the first team thoug I would have kicked major ass. Plus I still would have done the Time Warp. :D

March 21st baby Mini Rex's are born, 8!!! babies (2 tri's, 2 blacks, 3 whites, 1 black and white).

Senior week. All I have to say is that I will never look at Friendly's the same. Never...

4-H shows and end of fair awards.
Rabbit show- Each rabbit I showed got a blue ribbon(6). Baxter got best of breed Dutch. 1st place Senior II showmanship w/ Baxter. 
Horse show and Small Animal costume contest- missed the grooming class. Showed in showmanship, she flipped out over the smallest banner on the railing. Scratched the last 2 classes. Won Look-A-Like in the costume contest (Dressed as pirates w/ baxter).
Got 1st place Senior II Small Animal record book, Outstanding Worker, and a blue ribbon on both record books (horse and small animal). Also red ribbons on all my repainted horses (3).

Jan 8th horse show. Did Model in Hand class and was against like 30 horses. Did the senior showmanship class and Bonnie kept neighing but I was still happy that she stayed still and did as I asked of her. Then we did the Beginner Walk/Trot class and I ended up getting thrown off. She either got spooked somehow, tired of me trying to slow her down, or the people behind me hit into her. I really can't tell what exactly happend though. I was still pleased with her performance though.



Yeah, done writing!!! :)

Wow, haven't been on here in a million years. lol. 

Hrmm....lets see whats been happening??? Hrmmmm...

I did a show with Bonnie, my horse, on Nov 13th. We did 2 classes. We where going to do 3 but the trucks starter didn't want to work so my daddy had to fix that. Ne ways, we got 6th/6 :) in our showmanship class and 1st/1 :p in our beginner walk/trot class. I even got a little trophy from it. hehe. I'm still happy though.

Hrmm... what else to write...............thats all I can think of right now besides...YAY WINTER BREAK!!! lol. Hope everyone is having an awesome winter break and a happy holiday!!!!

Peace out! j/m

My dad is being a total assmuncher. Wednesday, when my mom left to Maine, he asked me what I had planned for the weekend. I told him I wanted to ride both Sat. and Sun. Well guess what, I didn't get to ride or even work Bonnie yesterday and now I probably won't get to do the same today cause my dad sucks major ass, always! Stupid fucker!! I hate we he puls this shit. I wouldn't mind so much if he only did once in a while but no, he has to do it everyday!! RARGG!

Woooo!! We almost won a game!!! YAY!! Go football peoples!!! lol. We also finally had a pep-rally for the first time!! Woo! Yeah!!

Yeah, I totally should not have marched last night lol. I did so bad! lol. Man, I'm starting to get pissed with people on the bus. Freaking Dan and Rudy moved my trumpet case out of my seat so they could sit there when they just had to move any way cause they had to sit on the other side of the bus. And at the last game Kristy stole my seat. I'm really pissed about all this. I don't move nebodys stuff so why should they be moving mine.

Also, I'm so confused about my band family. Some how there are people in it that I don't think should really be there. Ok, so I'm really freaking tired and I have a riding lesson tomorrow so I'm gonna go to bed. Later peoples!

Hrmm....where do I begin....ok I know.

I woke up 30 min late this morning. Then my mom stops off to get gas. So she fills up the tank and then asks me if I wanted some coffee and I said sure. So I go to get the coffee and I end up spilling all over the counter. Then we left the store and we got to start up the car and the air conditioner breaks. SO we drove to school w/ no A/C. By the time we get to school my coffee is cool enough to drink and so I do. Well, I end up spilling a lil on my WHITE shirt. I had a nice lil brown spot on my right boob for the entire day. So I go to first hour and it's hot as a bitch. That's when I realize I forgot to put on deodorant this morning. First time in forever. lol Second hour comes and come to find that the hurricane is a category 1. Yeah not cool. 3rd hour I find I pretty much failed the test from tuesday and now have a D in the class. WOOO, yeah. 4th hour, I forgot to do my homework the night before. Then lunch came. So I'm sitting in the Senior Section w/ Dani and one of my Junior friends comes to sit w/ us, she came the day before too, cause all her friends weren't there. Then Raff comes to sit w/ us and they both start picking on my MLP lunch-box. I was like WTF!! MLP rules! lol. During the last couple of mins of lunch I went to see mom cause she had a lil stick of deodorant. After that the day became so much better. lol. I think it was cause I had some chocolate. lol. Fun times fun times.

So mon. I get to run around to all the freshman English classes to try to get them to run for class officers and such. Hopefully I'll have enough time to do it for 1st, 5th, 6th, and 7th. I think it's 2 classes per period. I dunno. Oh well.

Well I'm going to run for Student Government. I'm not sure if I'm going to run for President or Vice. I'll figure that out later, hopefully before mon. lol. 

I'm also hoping that this hurricane either turns around or completely misses us and/or leaves a lil rain, but not too much. Ugh...stupid hurricanes. 

Pep rally has been moved to next friday and the game has been moved to Sep. 9th. Also, if you wear a pep club shirt to ANY HOME game you will get in for FREE!!!!! Doesn't that rock!!!! lol.

Well I'm going to go listen to some RBF. They make me happy. Catch ya'll later. I'm hoping that the rest of my day will not be as crappy as it was this morning. Laters!!

Hola everyone. Well, here is my shortened up Open House story.

Ok, get there at like 4:30. Run in the front office, get schedule then run to Mr. Clem's room. After that I start getting pic's (I'm Senior Class Historian, woo!!). I got a few of the band and a few of the administration. So, the band does their thing and when they get half-way done or whatever they got to break and mingle. So I go over and start to talk with my peoples and then all of a sudden Mr. Bearden (sp) comes up and tells me that my schedule is being changed so I am back in band. I was like WTF!!! How do you know me?!?!? lol. I told him that I didn't have time cause of Bonnie and all that and he said well, practices are only Tuesdays and Thursdays and that he knows my mom does do barn duty and all. Then Kristy W. comes up and tells him that I'm this awesome Trumpet player and that I'm the best, basically lieing to him lol. I was like, no I suck. And he was like, oh, I'll work with ya. I was like damn! lol.

After that I went back to the main office to get cooled off. Saw Jess there so her, her friend Sarah, and me all went around to our classes and stuff. Then they left and I went back to the main office. 

Oh, then friday my mom comes home with a folder full of Trumpet music. She told me that he said that I don't even need to be in the class to March. Well, I'm going to think about it. I haven't played the music yet, I dunno if I even remember how. lol.

Now on to today. I got that lazor hair removal thing on my face. It was pretty cool. Wasn't as bad as I thought it was going to be. lol. Then we went to Mr. Contoupes house. I got to work with his roommates horse Francesca and his mini stallion. They were pretty good. After seeing all the animals we left to go take care of Bonnie and pick up Kellie to go see March of the Penguins. We got there a lil late, missed a lil of the beginning. That was such a cute movie!!! Also a lil sad. But hey, thats nature....still sad though. :(  Oh, I've got one question though....why the hell do parents bring very young children to see these types of moives?? I'm talking about babies to 6 year olds. They don't know how to be quiet or anything...errrr....oh well.

Gah!! School is Monday!! lol. Later! :)

Day's Inn sucks major ass. I'm sorry but they just suck. My Aunt Chris had reservations for a down stairs smoking room. She even called before we left to tell them that we were on our way and that we were coming really late. We get there and they say that we didn't have any reservations. They ended up giving us an up stairs smoking room for a night. The next night they gave us a down stairs room. Then when we went to Georgia we stayed at another Day's Inn. It was even worse. We almost didn't get a room and I believe my Aunt made reservations there too, I'm not sure. Anywho, they give us an upstairs non-smoking room. They said they would let us know if another room opens up. The next day we couldn't get in the room because they changed the key on us. They thought we were changing rooms but yet they forgot that our stuff was still in the room. Plus the cleaning lady didn't even clan our room. Stupid hotel's!! Besides the whole hotel thing it was pretty fun up there. I got to see my cousin Mandie, well duh it was her graduation. lol. Speaking of her graduation...it was at their football field at about 7 o' clock. They only had 25 in their graduating class. It was nice. lol. My cousin was the senior class song leader and she sang their alma mater. (This was Friday) The next day we went to Georgia. Saw my Aunt and Uncle's property. Picked up my Uncle Harold's Deer head. It was a little thing. It was only a three pointer (points= how many points are on the antlers). My Uncle's and dad might take me huntin next season. (This was Saturday). The next day we put up no trespassing signs up and tried blocking off the entrances/exit's with cable's and such. My Uncle also let me shoot his pistol, I think it was a 22, not sure. This was the first time I had ever used a gun. I was shooting at a soda can about 10ft or more away. The first time I shot I was a foot from hitting the top of the can. The second time I shot I was an inch from hitting the bottom of the can. My uncle shot twice and he missed, I did better than him, lol. My Aunt shot once, missed to. Then my mom shot, she was way off. It was like if she was shooting for New York she would have hit California that was how bad she was. lol. Same day we went to a national park. It was so pretty. We walked around a little then we went to an old graveyard at the park. It was so awesome. A little creepy but awesome. lol. Monday we left for home. We stopped off at my Uncle Bruce's house to drop off some horse halters. I was surprised to see him there, I thought he would be at a parade or something. Funny thing was is that he was getting ready to leave for one. He ended up giving me this beautiful old english sidesaddle. It was made in the 1850's, so he says, I'm not sure if that's really true or not. It is n need of some repair cause my uncle never really took care of it. It already had somethings replaced. The seat has a really nice design on it. Sadly it is starting to rip where it meets the back of the saddle. Also, a lot of the original leather is cracking. Poor thing. :( Isn't it pretty?? (The saddle flap, the giant tan piece of leather, and the stirrup leather, the strap that the stirrup is hanging on, has been replaced) This saddle flap has been replaced as well. I think this back leather piece has been replaced. You can see where the leather is falling off on the horn. :( Look at the pretty seat. lol. Bottom and to the right is where it's ripping. You can see some of the horse hair padding (back then they used horse hair for padding). Here's some more ripping and cracking in the original leather. This is underneath the saddle flap. The billets, long strips with holes, have been replaced. You can see the original tree, the wood piece. The underside of the saddle. I don't know if this is stuffed with horse hair or wool. And one of the most important parts of the sidesaddle, the stirrup. I don't know if this is the original one or if it has been repalced somewhere in time. Hrrrmmmmmm....
